research experience.name: Planning with Residents: Linking Simulations to Community Narratives

research experience.organization: NYU, Center for Urban Science + Progress, Global Public Health; University of Florida; Fordham University
research experience.summary: An immersive experiment using virtual reality and multimodal measurement to study context-specific greenery and its effects on human physiology and psychology.

research experience.name: Spatial Analysis for Linguistic Landscape of Tianjin’s Former Concession
research experience.organization: Nankai University, School of Foreign Studies
research experience.summary: A spatial and qualitative study on how linguistic landscape changes in Tianjin's former concession districts relate to residents' cultural identity.
